tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Super easy A if you really don\'t want to try that much. Everything is literally on quizlet and you can bs the stuff that\'s not. However, you\'ll have to deal with a super unresponsive, unhelpful professor. Make sure your answers are super liberal for her video essays because she grades based on her opinion. Easy A tho so eh.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Lots of weekly required readings and a quiz every week. Lectures sometimes covered additional material that was not in the required text. No midterm, only 1 cumulative final exam. Fair grader. The course is manageable as long as you have time for a lot of reading and can retain information you learned from the beginning of the semester.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Professor Perry is an interesting and nutty lady, she genuinely loves her job and the subject she teaches. The classes are interesting and funny however, I would not say that I really "learned" a whole lot from it. The movie prompts and weekly quizzes are manageabl but she is a pretty tough grader so it was hard to get all possible points from that

comments: very passionate about teaching and is respectful of students - the material for this class is really broad, but it is fun to apply it to the real world in discussions and movies. the most fun are the in class activities

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: She\'s a smart woman, but the entire class consists of online reading quizzes that are timed and very detailed. Even if you diligently read the chapter and attend lecture, it is still hard to get 100% on the quizzes. She also gives film prompts where the questions are confusing and she is really critical. I like her, but I didn\'t like the structure.

comments: Really straight forward and interesting. You have to keep up with assignments but they are self paced so you need to be on top of your own sheet to make sure you get everything done. Tests based off book and lecture so read.

comments: Proff perry is so nice and funny. She\'s not hard but you have to earn the grade. Very passionate about the subject which is inspiring. Would like to take upper levels with her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is one of those professors who you either love or hate because she wants you to learn. if you don\'t learn, you don\'t do well. I am an A student and this was the most gratifying B+ I\'ve ever earned. I actually learned how to write this semester. great class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  EXTRA CREDIT  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Perry is my favorite professor I\'ve had so far. She is very relatable and down-to-earth. Assignments are not difficult, but participating in events takes time. The hardest part of the class was the midterm since it did not correspond to in-class power points. I would definitely take this class again or another class with Perry if I could!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I am not sure what the other people here are talking about because we only had a four page paper and five short essays to write this semester. I had a 10 page paper in another intro class, so this was pretty tame. The teaching assistant grades the essays really tough, but i think the professor is very fair. I also like the lectures. participate

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: 5 participation events outside of class, 5 movie prompts, a large paper, midterm, and final. She reads from the powerpoints. She tries to make lectures entertaining. Takes points off if you miss more then two classes. Our TA grades everything harshly. Movie prompts are unclear of what she\'s looking for. Events are awful. I would not take again

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is NOT EASY, and this class is not an easy A. I would suggest that you take it with someone else, requires participation and will call on people if no one volunteers. Reading is mandatory, but her tests comes from who knows where.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Prof T is the real deal. She is like a mother to her students. She has her own children so she understands not to stress us out and she is clear cut about what to know for the exams. She is a bit unorganized but you learn a lot and she makes things fun by allowing a lot of participation. Whoever wrote bad reviews doesn\'t deserve a good professor

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Not really sure why so many of the comments here are negative. This semester she was one of my favorite professors and I found the content of the class interesting. I would advise people against basing their decision on whether or not to take the class on negative reviews of people who probably received bad grades and were resentful.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: If you can get another professor for this course, do so. She missed several classes; but expected us to be there still. She does not post any class power points and is not very helpful or clear when it comes to being prepared for the tests.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I learned way more than i thought i would in this class. It was a challenge but we always had a lot of fun in the class and in the end I really enjoyed it. Do the reading - she makes sure it\'s evenly distributed - and make sure to get your papers edited for grammar.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: not the best professor. requires students to read textbook but nothing in textbook is in the exams. You have to be in class for powerpoint presentations which she doesn\'t post online but is on exam. had a hard lit review and group project that is graded on if she think ur project was interesting or not. Overall she does not care about students.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Participation matters (5)  Amazing lectures (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I took this as a prerequisite for nursing, and as a senior I felt as if she was kinda difficult for a 100 level class. She doesn\'t put blackboard notes up at all, and you HAVE to read the chapters in order to pass the pop quizzes. The final is cumulative. She can be rude, but funny at the same time.The group project is the easiest.
